channel.title: Need help with hosting
channel.description:
Alright, I opened 43594 port on my 2wire modem (gateway.2wire.net) Also opened in my fire wall (Firewall is off.) Also Tryed doing it through bittorrent (just said a port is already listening on 43594 when bittorrent is up, when off it doesn't.)
Add my msn if you can help
Arcadian583@hotmail.com (video to show problem and how i did portforwarding. http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=smzTwIGtWGg

item.title: Need help with hosting

Asking for hosters is against the rules, you’re a newly registered member and you’ve not read the rules. So please read the rules before making another post.
[/quote]

When did he ask for a hoster?[/quote]

I did earlier but i edited my host.
Btw have any help or just post hunting?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 19, 2009, 07:14:01 pm[/size][hr]any help? posted vid.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 19, 2009, 08:42:18 pm[/size][hr]cana nyone help!?!?

item.title: Need help with hosting
item.dc:creator: @arcadian583 arcadian583
item.description:
@arcadian583 wrote:

[quote=“vamp256, post:3, topic:279181”]You probably didnt portforward properly…

utorrent.com

µTorrent - a (very) tiny BitTorrent client

The official µTorrent® (uTorrent) torrent client for Windows, Mac, Android and Linux-- uTorrent is the #1 BitTorrent download client on desktops worldwide.


Try that[/quote]

I tryed bittorrent, and i did open the ports properly :S

I’ll make a vid one sec.
